name: Quoala
description:
Francis has just bought a new GPS tracking device named Quoala. He is now in holidays with his wife, driving to his hostel, but unfortunately, the Quoala has low battery. 

Quoala is a minimalist narrative game  with a GPS device, with multiple endings.

Quoala is my submission for ludum dare 39, Compo. Made in less than 2 days by one person only. The theme was : "Running out of power."
